column2: "Afei iyinom nye hɔn egyanom efiefi etsitsir
column3: na hɔn a ɔhen Artasɛkeses n’ahendzi no mu no wɔnye me fi Babilɔn sii mu kɔree no
Gersom: Itamarmba mu
Zekaria: na wɔnam hɔn ebusuasantsen do kaan mbanyin mu ɔha eduonum kaa no ho."
Zerahia ba Eliehoenai; na mbanyin ahaenu ka no ho."
Jahaziel ba no; na mbanyin ahaasa ka no ho."
Jonatan ba Ebed; na mbanyin eduonum ka no ho."
Atalia ba Jesaia; na mbanyin eduosuon ka no ho."
Maekɛl ba Zebadia
column4: na mbanyin eduowɔtwe ka no ho."

column3: Jehiel ba Obadia; na mbanyin ahaenu duawɔtwe ka no ho."
Josifia ba no; na mbanyin ɔha eduosia ka no ho."
Bebai ba Zekaria; na mbanyin eduonu awɔtwe ka no ho."
Hakatan ba Johanan; na mbanyin ɔha na du ka no ho."

column2: "Adonikammba a wodzi ekyir no mu; hɔn edzin nye yi
column3: Elifelet
column6: na mbanyin eduosia ka no ho."

column3: Utai na Zabud; na mbanyin eduosuon ka no ho."

column2: "Na moboaboaa hɔn ano hyiaa esutsen a ɔpem kɔ Ahava no ho
column3: na yɛkyeer hɔ nsera ndaansa; na mohwehwɛɛ ɔman no nye asɔfo no mu
column4: na mennhu Levimba no mu bi wɔ hɔ."

column3: Semaia
column11: na Elnatan a wɔyɛ akyerɛkyerɛfo no."

column3: otsitsir a ɔwɔ Kasifia kurow mu no nkyɛn; na mekaa dza wɔnkɛka nkyerɛ Iddo na no nuanom Netinfo a wɔwɔ Kasifia kurow mu no kyerɛɛ hɔn
column4: dɛ wɔmfa asomfo a wɔbɔsom wɔ hɛn Nyankopɔn fie mbrɛ hɛn."

column2: "Na dɛ mbrɛ hɛn Nyankopɔn ne nsa pa a ɔwɔ hɛn do tse no
column3: wɔbrɛɛ hɛn onyimdzefo bi a ofi Mahili
column6: ne mba no mu; na Serebia
column7: ne mba na no nuanom duawɔtwe ka no ho;"

column3: na Jesaia a ofi Merarimba mu
column4: no nuanom na hɔn mba eduonu ka no ho;"

column2: "na Netinfo so a David na mbapɔmba no yii hɔn maa Levifo som no
column3: wɔyɛ Netinfo ahaenu eduonu: hɔn nyinara wɔbobɔɔ hɔn edzin."

column2: "Na mobɔɔ mbuadadzi ho dawur wɔ hɔ
column3: wɔ esutsen Ahava do
column4: ama yaabrɛ hɛnho adze wɔ hɛn Nyankopɔn enyim
column5: ahwehwɛ no hɔ kwan tsenenee ama hɛnho

column2: "Na ɔyɛɛ me enyito dɛ mibebisa ɔhen hɔ nsordaafokuw na mpɔnkɔdofo ma wɔaaboa hɛn wɔ atamfo ho wɔ kwan mu: osiandɛ yɛaka akyerɛ ɔhen
column3: dɛ
column4: Hɛn Nyankopɔn ne nsa wɔ hɔn a wɔhwehwɛ no nyinara do dze ma hɔn yie: na no tum na n’ebufuw wɔ hɔn a wɔpow no nyinara do."

column2: "Nna yedzii mbuada na yɛserɛɛ iyi wɔ hɛn Nyankopɔn hɔ: na otsiee hɛn."
"Nna miyii asɔfo no mu etsitsir duebien
column3: mekyerɛ Serebia
column5: na hɔn nuanom no mu du ka hɔn ho
column10: mekyerɛ hɛn Nyankopɔn fi ho afɔrbɔdze a ɔhen na n’apamfo
column12: na Israel a wohun wɔ ho no nyinara

column2: "na mikeer dwetɛ  talent   ahaesia eduonum mpo so hyɛɛ hɔn nsa
column3: na dwetɛ ndzɛmba  talent   ɔha; sika so  talent   ɔha;"

column2: "na sika mbɛɛsen eduonu a ɔsom sika  darik   apem; na boran fɛɛfɛw ndzɛmba hyɛnhyɛn ebien a no bo yɛ dzen dɛ sika."

column3: Hom yɛ krɔnkrɔndze ma EWURADZE
column4: na ndzɛmba yi so yɛ krɔnkrɔn; na dwetɛ na sika no yɛ ayamuyi afɔr dze ma EWURADZE

column3: na wɔnhwɛ do ara
column4: nkodu dɛ hom beker no wɔ asɔfo etsitsir no na Levifo no
column5: na Israel mu egyanom efiefi do mbapɔmba no hɔn enyim
column7: wɔ EWURADZE ne fi no ne mpia no mu."

column2: "Nna asɔfo no na Levifo no gyee dwetɛ na sika
column3: na ndzɛmba no a wokerii no dɛ wɔdze reba Jerusalɛm dze abɛma hɛn Nyankopɔn no fi no."

column2: "Na bosoom a odzi kan no ne nda a otsia duebien no mu na yefi esutsen Ahava ho sii mu dɛ yɛrokɔ Jerusalɛm: na hɛn Nyankopɔn nsa wɔ hɛn do
column3: na ɔgyee hɛn fii atamfo na ɔkwan do atsɛweefo no nsamu."
na yɛtsenaa hɔ ndaansa."
wokeer dwetɛ no na sika no na ndzɛmba no wɔ hɛn Nyankopɔn fie
column4: dze hyɛɛ Uria ba sɔfo Meremot nsa; na Finehas ba Eleazar ka no ho; na Jesua ba Jozabad

column3: na wɔkyerɛɛw ne nyinara wɔ nwoma mu."

column2: "Ndɔmmumkɔmba no a wofi amantu mu bae no
column3: wɔdze ɔhyew afɔr brɛɛ Israel Nyankopɔn no
column8: bɔn ho afɔr mpɔnkyenyin duebien: iyi nyinara yɛ hyew afɔr dze ma EWURADZE."

column2: "Na wɔdze ɔhen no ne mbra no maa ɔhen n’amansin do ahwɛfo na n’ambradofo a wɔwɔ esuegya noho no
column3: na wɔwowaaw ɔman no na Nyankopɔn ne fi no."
